title: How to watch the full Harry Potter series - Quora

response.answer_text: I don't think they are available for streaming for free anywhere, unfortunately. You can purchase them on video downloading sites such as iTunes or Amazon Video, if you're willing to pay. If you have cable, the channel Freeform (previously known as ABC Family) usually does Harry Potter marathons on the weekends, so you could watch those live or record them.
All of the Harry Potter movies are currently free because there was just a Harry Potter weekend.
